meanings.sent1: Lack of job opportunities can impoverish families.
meanings.sent2: The economic crisis can impoverish entire communities.
meanings.sent3: Trying to buy everything at once can quickly impoverish your wallet.
meanings.sent4: The constant spending spree will eventually impoverish your savings.
meanings.sent5: The drought continued to impoverish the already struggling farmers.

meanings.definition: Exhaust the strength or vitality of
meanings.sent1: The long hike in the sun can impoverish your energy levels.
meanings.sent2: Working long hours without breaks can impoverish your health.
meanings.sent3: Running a marathon can temporarily impoverish your legs.
meanings.sent4: The intense workout session will quickly impoverish your stamina.
meanings.sent5: The demanding project deadlines can impoverish your mental resilience.
